name:
we see the stars at night
but they are cold
we see eyes looking at us
but their tears have dried
The mountains and roads in front of us
look high and dark
but somewhere behind them
we feel the light
of the hearts
big enough to warm up the universe
not only our big searching eyes
even though at time then when we found ourselves helpless in a war front without weapons to defend, we have our heart, as the unique weapon that no one or any nation can take away from us

the last sight we took of HOME
had to capture it all
like a snapshot frozen in time
since what we left behind
will always define
what we become

our abyssal flight frightens everyone's eyes
look away / if you can not / grow

hope and fear
go side by side
along the road

That night the bell rang only once
And died off helplessly
Wrapped in warm darkness
And eerie mist
We boarded the boat
Each of us carrying heavily
Nothing but our destinies
Colliding in the darkness.
we face the blue graves to reach our stolen fortune.

...with them we seek for hope in the most hidden places
beyond this moment in time.
We march along with faith
uncertain we'll ever meet tomorrow again.

The sky lowers
with a storm,
the world diminishes,
my eyes fill with a vision of hell,
memories fade,
and: here is the end.
We miss home
We lift our hands and eyes to the skies and find each other

we escaped persecution, on the road we face discrimination, down to dehumanization, down from shiny ideals of our shared humanity, which also brought colonialization, can we ever escape racialization?

We can't have our own homes, we seek refuge.Why is that?You ask.Everyone knows this fact,no one is willing to complete the task.To help, empower, support, everyone refuses, puts up forts.Time to take this case to the World Court.

There are eyes
That are forever
seeking to be noticed.
Value lives
Search for the
Frightful eyes.

Bring up the gate
Banish the red-lined boarders.
Reach out with benevolence
Genuine love for beings
Eradicate indifference.

Our destinies,
Warped apart, endured,
Branded, bravely borne,
Have been awarded by this encounter, this escape,
By the starless night and the absence of fear.

they are released form possessions
they have nothing but air in their hands.
They have the sky to talk to.
Their ancestors without graves
are in their hearts now to live forever,
all with one heartbeat.

I'm stifling,
I blaze with passion,
gushing from me
a mortal cry,
I fear that I wonâ€™t
seem to be silent
within myself.

Their loftiness is better
Than thousands without chains
I believe they last forever
In despite of the pain.
Maybe they should desist
Such a destiny!
But they just keep going
They will be protagonists.
We are them

the western world turns their blind eye and turns a deaf ear to the innocent cries not even stops to stare it seems that they dont care, as darkness replaces light, as innocent people are forced to take flight!
Those who have left their homes know that life is within, and is to be lived everywhere

We have it all,homes,food,beds to lie in,a masked ball,charade of sin.How do we sleep at night,when there's so much people living in fright?When is this cycle gonna end?Will the world start helping and repent?
their courage to hope for humanity encourages us to trust in humanity.
the war is chasing us. My doorsteps moves to where my children can play

we are heading towards direction of our destiny not destination. We were not afraid or ashamed to die on our doorstep, but as human we struggled to survive cos we all are born freely  we know where we are from and its our responsibility as mankind  to protect our life's from calamities
the world is my doorstep

...no one is born to die
but to live their dreams!
Don't you have dreams of love, seeing the world
and building the life you deserve?
In my every heartbeat I feel
The desire to make them real
Just like you...
Because...

Silence, silence, silence,
from which, without a sound,
we clearly hear our thoughts.
A ship of haunted souls,
and over it, not a single star.
loosing my existence amplifies the very human sin of existence.

I must flee

All in me collapses
like trees in an ancient wood.
Far from myself I must flee
for my mind is not good.

From what is all too real
there is only the hope
to defend myself with dreams
from the strangling rope.
Miryam wants to go back to beautiful before the bombs fell. Now she looks to the distance from the door of the hut in the camp. She sings. There are a thousand song birds in her throat.
I want to have the time
The door to life must always be open

I don't want to be dead,another lifeless body lying on the street,with each passing day I see death's greet.I want to live, have a chance at a normal life, like the rest of the world,HERE,NOW,not in the afterlife.

8934782

In the hollow pockets
among frozen fingers
I'm clenching the last crumbs of dreams.
Dogs are barking. They do not know me.
Children are responding to parents calls.
Nobady is calling my name,
I'm a number.
